pullrequest.title: Fix setProvideFeedback in ODE and Bullet

content.raw:
Actually I was ok with just this modifications. 
To be sincere I never saw the point of the `provide_feedback` option, I have the impressions that the performance gains of not using it are negligible (this is just a personal impression, happy to be see any benchmark on the topic), so I assumed that avoiding spreading it to a the message definition was relatively good.

To be sincere I never saw the point of the provide_feedback option, I have the impressions that the performance gains of not using it are negligible (this is just a personal impression, happy to be see any benchmark on the topic), so I assumed that avoiding spreading it to a the message definition was relatively good.
